text: Ljubomir "Ljuba" Aličić (; born 2 November 1955) is a Serbian Romani folk singer with a career spanning more than four decades. One of his biggest hits is the 2003 single Ciganin sam, al' najlepši. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:People from Šabac Category:Romani singers Category:Serbian Romani people Category:Serbian male singers Category:Serbian folk singers Category:Serbian pop-folk singers Category:Yugoslav male singers Category:Grand Production artists Category:Parovi
title: Ljuba Aličić
